posts.post_content:
Today we are cooking with Simic! This is what you will need : [Vigean hydropon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vigean hydropon), these fungi are growing everywhere, so dont be afraid to use them a lot and on everything. [Cytoplast manipulator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cytoplast manipulator), preferably with [lightning greaves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=lightning greaves) from 2nd turn. Now is the right time to finally use [Training grounds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Training grounds) you had from first turn, since you are adding [Vigean Graftmage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vigean Graftmage) to the stew!
  
   
Now you are finished! Look at this, nice [Mind control](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mind control) for 2 mana multiple times in one round. Best served with [Doubling Season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Season)
posts.html:
